Subtitle.iv: Have you ever heard of us?

iv.text: A group of individuals with their own personality, skillset that when put together are able to complement each one’s gaps and flaws, becoming a strong, united and talented team that is specialized in Logistics and Supply Chain execution solutions and how they fit on the overall architecture for both Retailers & 3PL companies.

Subtitle.iv: Specialized in Logistics and Supply Chain execution solutions

iv.Title: Implementation
iv.Subtitle: we deliver on function, on time and on budget

iv.Title: Consultancy
iv.Subtitle: we provide consultancy to increase implementations’ efficiency

iv.Title: Integration and Data Migration
iv.Subtitle: an effective implementation needs to kick off with clean business data and integrate smoothly with other systems

iv.Title: Support
iv.Subtitle: availability for diagnosis, to fix issues and to act on route causes to release support needs over time

iv.text: We position ourselves as an extension of our client’s team, implementing a single team spirit in each project.  We invest in understanding our clients’ business and challenging them with creative value added solutions that may include revision of business processes, always having in mind the maximization of business value.  Trust, respect and openness built between us and our clients are key ingredients for the success of each implementation project.

We invest in understanding our clients businesses and where they want to go. Combining those with the specialized knowledge in logistics and supply chain processes, and analyzing how they fit in the overall business and architecture, we deliver successful implementations of “state of the art” supply chain solutions while preserving specific business processes that are differentiators for our clients’ businesses.   We partner with our clients not only to deliver a seamless implementation service, but also to support its ongoing needs with support services leveraging long-term relationships with our clients.
